channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPlus -- Better Messages – Live Chat for WordPress, BuddyPress, PeepSo, Ultimate Member, BuddyBoss
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPlus -- Better Messages – Live Chat for WordPress, BuddyPress, PeepSo, Ultimate Member, BuddyBoss

item.title: CVE-2023-49168|2024-08-02T21:46:29.293Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%E2%80%93%20live%20chat%20for%20wordpress%2C%20buddypress%2C%20peepso%2C%20ultimate%20member%2C%20buddyboss
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WordPlus Better Messages – Live Chat for WordPress, BuddyPress, PeepSo, Ultimate Member, BuddyBoss allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Better Messages – Live Chat for WordPress, BuddyPress, PeepSo, Ultimate Member, BuddyBoss: from n/a through 2.4.0.
